tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ReliefEfforts (
  relief_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  date DATE,
  aid_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  impact_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE EvaluationMetrics (
  evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  relief_id INT,
  effectiveness_rating VARCHAR(50),
  impact_score INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (relief_id) REFERENCES ReliefEfforts(relief_id)
);

CREATE TABLE relief_efforts (
  organization_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  date DATE,
  amount_spent DECIMAL,
  success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE organizations (
  organization_id INT,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  contact_person VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id INT,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  country VARCHAR(100),
  population INT
);

CREATE TABLE ReliefEfforts (
  relief_id INT NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  impact_area_id INT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Volunteers (
  volunteer_id INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  gender CHAR(1) NOT NULL,
  skills VARCHAR(100) NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SuccessMetrics (
  metric_id INT NOT NULL,
  relief_id INT NOT NULL,
  area_id INT NOT NULL,
  metric_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  metric_value DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL
);
